com.hexaware.model

Class Tax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hexaware.model.Tax

  • public class Tax
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents tax information associated with an employee for a specific tax year.

      • Tax

        public Tax(int taxId,
           int employeeId,
           int taxYear,
           double income,
           double taxAmount)
        Constructs a Tax object with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        taxId - Unique identifier for the tax record
        employeeId - Identifier of the associated employee
        taxYear - Tax year for which the tax information is recorded
        income - Income of the employee for the tax year
        taxAmount - Tax amount calculated for the employee for the tax year
